name: Batman: Arkham VR
description: Игра погрузит вас в мир Темного Рыцаря и позволит по-настоящему ощутить себя величайшим детективом на планете!

name: Westworld Awakening
description: “Westworld Awakening” is a narrative-driven experience played from the perspective of Kate – a host who has attained self-awareness. To survive a dangerous underworld where no one and nothing is what it seems, you must overcome an entire world designed to destroy and enslave you.

name: Serious Sam VR: The Last Hope
description: Можете ли Вы представить: настоящий монстр бежит прямо на Вас, а у Вас в руках его уже ждёт парочка дробовиков? Да, настолько хороша эта игра! Время учиться у больших мальчиков!

name: Beat Saber
description: Beat Saber is a VR rhythm game where you slash the beats of adrenaline-pumping music as they fly towards you, surrounded by a futuristic world.
tags: Music, Rhythm, Indie, Great Soundtrack, VR

name: SUPERHOT VR
description: Lose track of what’s real. Commit yourself, body and mind. Confront the evocative, elegantly brutal world of SUPERHOT VR. Enemies pouring into the room from all sides, dozens of bullets coursing through the air... Wait. Something seems different in here...

name: Arizona Sunshine
description: Built exclusively for VR, Arizona Sunshine puts you in the midst of a zombie apocalypse. Handle weapons with real-life movements, freely explore a post-apocalyptic world, and put your survival skills to the test in VR - putting the undead back to rest is more thrilling than ever before.

name: Fruit Ninja
description: Тот самый Frut Ninja, только теперь Вы по-настоящему размахиваете самурайскими катанами и нарезаете сочные фрукты!

name: The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim VR
description: A true, full-length open-world game for VR has arrived from Bethesda Game Studios. Skyrim VR reimagines the complete epic fantasy masterpiece with an unparalleled sense of scale, depth, and immersion. Skyrim VR also includes all official add-ons.
tags: Open World, RPG, VR, Singleplayer, Adventure

name: Rick and Morty: Virtual Rick-ality
description: Эта игра даст возможность побывать в нескольких причудливых параллельных мирах из мультсериала Рик и Морти, в которых вас ждут задания от Рика Санчеза, необычные головоломки и много неожиданных приключений!

name: Loco Dojo
description: Веселая аркадная игра, в которой Вам предстоит соревноваться с друзьями в 16-ти причудливых мини-играх и проходить каверзные испытания от великого сенсея!

name: Zero Caliber VR
description: Zero Caliber is a military FPS developed exclusively for VR. Customize your weapons on-the-fly, fight alongside your friends in Co-op (PvP coming soon!) and use your tactical skills to accomplish the mission: saving humanity! Engaging story, realistic weapon handling and physics in an immersive environment!

name: GORN
description: GORN is a ludicrously violent VR gladiator simulator, made by Free Lives, the developers of Broforce and Genital Jousting.
